definition: the raised helical rib going around a screw, thread on or as if on a string
details:
noun
- the raised helical rib going around a screw
= synonyms: screw thread
- a fine cord of twisted fibers (of cotton or silk or wool or nylon etc.) used in sewing and weaving
= synonyms: yarn
- the connections that link the various parts of an event or argument together
= synonyms: train of thought
- any long object resembling a thin line
= synonyms: ribbon
verb
- thread on or as if on a string
= synonyms: draw
- pass through or into
= example: pass through or into
- remove facial hair by tying a fine string around it and pulling at the string
= example: remove facial hair by tying a fine string around it and pulling at the string
- pass a thread through
= example: pass a thread through
- to move or cause to move in a sinuous, spiral, or circular course
= synonyms: meander
